mapper.update: UPDATE file SET s3_key = REPLACE(s3_key, #{oldPrefix}, #{newPrefix}) WHERE s3_key LIKE CONCAT(#{oldPrefix}, '%') AND member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.original_filename, p.size, p.content_type, p.sido, p.sigungu, p.eupmyeondong, p.latitude, p.longitude, p.is_deleted, p.created_at, p.taken_at, m.name AS member_name FROM file p JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE p.file_id = #{fileId} AND p.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(TRIM(TRAILING '/' FROM d.dir_name), '/', -1),'/') AS name, SUM(p.size) AS size, COUNT(p.size) AS count FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT( SUBSTRING_INDEX(s3_key, '/', CHAR_LENGTH(#{prefix}) - CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(#{prefix}, '/', '')) + 1 ), '/' ) AS dir_name FROM file WHERE s3_key LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%') AND is_deleted = #{isDeleted} ) AS temp WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(dir_name) - CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(dir_name, '/', '')) = CHAR_LENGTH(#{prefix}) - CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(#{prefix}, '/', '')) + 1 ) AS d JOIN file p ON p.s3_key LIKE CONCAT(d.dir_name, '%') GROUP BY d.dir_name;
